text: Josef Smolka (22 March 1939 - 1 June 2020) was a Czech volleyball player. He competed for Czechoslovakia in the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Troubky, in the PÅ™erov District. In 1968 he was part of the Czechoslovak team which won the bronze medal in the Olympic tournament. He played in seven matches. Smolka died on 1 June 2020, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * profile Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Czech volleyball players Category:Czechoslovak volleyball players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Czech Republic Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Czechoslovakia
title: Josef Smolka
